016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.junit5;
017
018import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureApplication;
019import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureComponents;
020import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureManagedBeans;
021import static de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurationHelper.configureRequestConfig;
022
023import java.util.ArrayList;
024import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Objects;
027import java.util.Optional;
028import java.util.Set;
029import java.util.stream.Collectors;
030
031import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockFacesContext;
032import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback;
033import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
034import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Namespace;
035import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestInstancePostProcessor;
036import org.junit.platform.commons.support.AnnotationSupport;
037
038import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.JsfTestConfiguration;
039import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.ConfigurableApplication;
040import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfEnvironmentConsumer;
041import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfEnvironmentHolder;
042import de.cuioss.test.jsf.util.JsfRuntimeSetup;
043import de.cuioss.tools.logging.CuiLogger;
044
045/**
046 * Starts and Configures the {@link JsfRuntimeSetup}, wraps it into an
047 * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder} and inject it into an
048 * {@link JsfEnvironmentConsumer} if available
049 *
050 * @author Oliver Wolff
051 *
052 */
053public class JsfSetupExtension implements TestInstancePostProcessor, AfterEachCallback {
054
055    private static final CuiLogger LOGGER = new CuiLogger(JsfSetupExtension.class);
056
057    /**
058     * Identifies the {@link Namespace} under which the concrete instance of
059     * {@link JsfRuntimeSetup} is stored .
060     */
061    public static final Namespace NAMESPACE = Namespace.create("test", "jsf", "JsfRuntimeSetup");
062
063    @Override
064    @SuppressWarnings("squid:S3655")
065    public void postProcessTestInstance(Object testInstance, ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
066        var setup = new JsfRuntimeSetup();
067        LOGGER.info(() -> "Starting JSF-Environment");
068        setup.setUp();
069        put(setup, context);
070
071        var useIdentityResourceBundle = false;
072        List<EnableJsfEnvironment> environments = new ArrayList<>();
073        retrieveEnableJSFAnnotations(testInstance.getClass(), environments);
074        if (!environments.isEmpty()) {
075            // Use the outermost annotation
076            useIdentityResourceBundle = environments.get(0).useIdentityResourceBundle();
077        }
078
079        var environment = new JsfEnvironmentHolder(setup);
080        ConfigurableApplication.createWrapAndRegister((MockFacesContext) environment.getFacesContext())
081                .setUseIdentityResouceBundle(useIdentityResourceBundle);
082
083        // Ensure that the ConfigurableApplication is set for
084        // JsfRuntimeSetup#getApplication
085        setup.setApplication(environment.getFacesContext().getApplication());
086
087        LOGGER.debug(() -> "Registering Decorators");
088        Set<JsfTestConfiguration> decoratorAnnotations = new LinkedHashSet<>(16);
089
090        retrieveDecoratorAnnotations(testInstance.getClass(), decoratorAnnotations);
091        decoratorAnnotations = decoratorAnnotations.stream().filter(Objects::nonNull).collect(Collectors.toSet());
092
093        configureApplication(testInstance, environment.getApplicationConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
094        configureComponents(testInstance, environment.getComponentConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
095        configureManagedBeans(testInstance, environment.getBeanConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
096        configureRequestConfig(testInstance, environment.getRequestConfigDecorator(), decoratorAnnotations);
097
098        if (testInstance instanceof JsfEnvironmentConsumer consumer) {
099            consumer.setEnvironmentHolder(environment);
100        }
101    }
102
103    private void retrieveDecoratorAnnotations(Class<?> type, Set<JsfTestConfiguration> result) {
104        if (null == type || Object.class.equals(type)) {
105            return;
106        }
107        result.addAll(AnnotationSupport.findRepeatableAnnotations(type, JsfTestConfiguration.class));
108        retrieveDecoratorAnnotations(type.getSuperclass(), result);
109    }
110
111    private void retrieveEnableJSFAnnotations(Class<?> type, List<EnableJsfEnvironment> result) {
112        if (null == type || Object.class.equals(type)) {
113            return;
114        }
115        result.addAll(AnnotationSupport.findRepeatableAnnotations(type, EnableJsfEnvironment.class));
116        retrieveEnableJSFAnnotations(type.getSuperclass(), result);
117    }
118
119    @Override
120    public void afterEach(ExtensionContext context) {
121        LOGGER.debug(() -> "Tear-Down JSF-Environment");
122        get(context).ifPresent(JsfRuntimeSetup::tearDown);
123    }
124
125    private static void put(JsfRuntimeSetup runtimeSetup, ExtensionContext context) {
126        context.getStore(NAMESPACE).put(JsfRuntimeSetup.class.getName(), runtimeSetup);
127    }
128
129    private Optional<JsfRuntimeSetup> get(ExtensionContext context) {
130        return Optional.ofNullable((JsfRuntimeSetup) context.getStore(NAMESPACE).get(JsfRuntimeSetup.class.getName()));
131    }
132}
